title: Microsoft Security DevOps Rules Format (MSDORF) Version 0.1.0 JSON Schema
description: Microsoft Security DevOps Rules Format (MSDORF) Version 0.1.0 JSON Schema: a standard rules format for overriding rule definitions of static analysis tools.

$schema.description: The URI of the JSON schema corresponding to the version.

version.description: The version of this file or data.

properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the policy file.

policyControls.description: Policy control options to instruct a policy reader to act in a certain way.

policyTool.description: A static analysis tool definition to set tool-wide and tool-specific policy controls.

policyRule.description: Policy controls for a specific static analysis rule.

propertyBag.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the object.

tags.description: A set of distinct strings that provide additional information.
